comment: Laziest professor to ever walk this earth. All she does is post 2+ hour-long youtube videos every week. You have discussion posts and a 3-page paper, every single week. Also, there are 3 exams, that are essay questions and easy. Seems like a lot of work for someone who puts in 0 effort at all, but the class is an easy A.

Laziest professor ever known to man. She doesn't teach at all, only posts 2+ hour youtube videos every week. You have discussion posts and a 3-page paper every single week, and 3 essay exams (easy). It's a lot of work for someone who doesn't even care to put in any type of effort, but the class is an easy A.
I recommend taking her class. Each week we had a discussion board and a 3 page paper usually based off of a video. It may sound like a lot, but it was very easy. She also didnt grade hard.
